name: I Spent More Time On the Steak
name_original: I Spent More Time On the Steak
description:
A commentary about some visual novel and other games as of recent. Kind of. It was more of an excuse to draw a cute anime girl.

I spent more time on drawing the steak than drawing Cassie...

  • Art made by me
  • BG from public domain (edited)
  • Music by Kevin Macleod on Incompetech
  • Blow1.wav from RPG Maker
  • Sadtrombone.wav from SoundBoard
  • Made for Experimental Games Class February 2019

PC and Mac dists available below
